Profile1.profile_description:
ü©∏ Cluster 1 ‚Äî Detailed Persona Profile
Title: ‚ÄúEnergetic but Dysregulated‚Äù
Cluster size: ~20 users

1Ô∏è‚É£ Hormonal Rhythm
- LH mean ‚âà 6.9, median ‚âà 5.0 ‚Üí upper-normal LH baseline.
- Frequent LH elevations suggest short or erratic transitions from follicular to luteal phases.
- Possible signs: high ovarian stimulation, luteal insufficiency, or stress-linked LH fluctuations.

2Ô∏è‚É£ Thermoregulation
- Negative nightly_temperature_skew ‚Üí cooler nights.
- Inconsistent luteal thermal rise ‚Üí possible irregular ovulation or incomplete temperature shift.

3Ô∏è‚É£ Fatigue & Mood
- fatigue_prop_VeryLowLittle ‚âà 0.13 ‚Üí notable fatigue phases.
- Mood variability high ‚Üí emotional swings in luteal phase.

4Ô∏è‚É£ Sleep Patterns
- High restlessness range.
- Large range in deep sleep duration.
- Declining total sleep trend ‚Üí poor recovery near luteal phase.

5Ô∏è‚É£ Activity
- High elevationgain kurtosis; erratic movement.
- Strong activity bursts even during low-energy phases ‚Üí indicates overtraining risk.

6Ô∏è‚É£ HRV
- RMSSD ‚âà 52 ms with flat recovery curve ‚Üí sympathetic dominance spikes.

üß† Female Health Interpretation
- Likely luteal-phase strain with poor recovery.
- High LH suggests short cycles, incomplete ovulation, or cortisol-LH interference.
- Characteristic of active women with irregular rest + fluctuating energy.

9Ô∏è‚É£ Actionable Summary for Downstream Use
LLM context:
‚ÄúWomen with high LH tone, irregular sleep/recovery, and bursty movement patterns showing luteal-phase strain and high physiological stress load.‚Äù

Profile3.profile_description:
ü©π Cluster 3 ‚Äî Detailed Persona Profile

2Ô∏è‚É£ Thermoregulation

3Ô∏è‚É£ Fatigue & Mood

4Ô∏è‚É£ Sleep
- Long but non-restorative sleep.

5Ô∏è‚É£ Activity

6Ô∏è‚É£ HRV

üß† Female Health Interpretation

9Ô∏è‚É£ Actionable Summary for Downstream Use
